name: Silent Road
description: A small game I made for the new GMC JAM #1 game jam. The theme was "everything is dead". In this game I decided to just experiment with a different art style than my norm. You play as the driver of a car on a single endless road, trying to avoid the hordes of the undead, lest you hit them and the splat all over your windscreen (hate when that happens, right?).
